t: What Was Amazon Spark and Why Was it Discontinued?
s: March 18, 2021 - Amazon Spark was a social commerce platform shut down in 2019. It failed to gain traction because of its confusing UI and poor promotional strategy.

t: Amazon Has a Social Media Platform? We Tried Out Spark
s: Amazon describes Spark as “a feed of stories and photos from Amazon customers featuring products ready for purchase.” They encourage Spark users to post pictures, products, stories, etc. and gives them the ability to tag products in the process.
